description: Multiple *.js.map and *.d.ts.map artifacts are tracked under src/. These are build outputs; keeping them checked in risks stale metadata and bloats the package. They should live in dist/ only.
patch_hint:
--- /dev/null
+++ b/packages/prp-runner/.gitignore
@@
+src/**/*.js.map
+src/**/*.d.ts.map
--- a/packages/prp-runner/src/ai-capabilities.d.ts.map
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1 +0,0 @@
-<compiled map>

+++ /dev/null
